title: Game-Based Economics Simulation: Intermediate Practitioner Competency Enhancement

context.prior_knowledge: High School-Level Foundational Economic Concepts and Basic Statistical Knowledge
context.additional_context: Focused on cultivating the ability to apply economic theories to real business scenarios for job seekers. Conducted in a BYOD environment with offline workshops and online gaming platforms

learning_goals: Learners can make decisions in virtual markets based on economic theories and analyze resulting economic impacts.
Learners can design and implement strategies to solve collective economic problems through in-game collaboration.
Learners can build predictive models for economic policy changes using simulation data and document findings in project reports.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
